resources.string: uniBOT responds right away. No waiting, planning or delays; just
uniBOT uses different APIs and artifical intelligence
Get access whenever and wherever you want!
Let it help you with your questions regarding study, grades or something else
This is us. We are cool and nice people.
API.AI dude. But is busy with girls and cabin-trips.
Traveling alot. Kiel, Manchester and soon Riga. His motto is YOLO.
Erik won a match against "Handelshøyskolen". He is very proud of it.
To see the welcome slider again, goto Settings -> apps -> welcome slider -> clear data
